attributes.action: Stop banning petitions on the No.10 website.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop banning petitions on the No.10 website.

rejection.details: As a publically funded website, not all petitions can be accepted.  Please see the Terms and Conditions page for a list of rejection criteria.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
